name: Particigate
description:
Life comes with many balances, a pair. The afterlife has split that very pair in a final test.

Roam a world in-between worlds as a split essence in search of becoming one again, to move on to the next stage. Journey through the Gallery as two separate halves, examining each room for clues in order to find the answer correlating to that of your fellow half's room.

Game is intended to play as a pair/separate game windows.

A project by Dream Team for Global Game 2022, using the theme “Duality.”

Dream Team is an Australian four member team of participants consisting of:

Amanda Parks | Programming & Tech Art, Level Design

Harley Brown | Narrative Design, Script, Voice Acting

Jane Wei | Music, Sound Design

Samantha Handley | 3D Art, 2D Art and Design
